summary: This bill, the Flatside Wilderness Additions Act, aims to expand the Flatside Wilderness area within the Ouachita National Forest in Arkansas. It amends the Arkansas Wilderness Act of 1984 to include approximately 2,212 acres of land proposed for wilderness designation. The bill also clarifies that the Secretary of Agriculture's authority regarding fire, insects, and diseases within the wilderness remains unchanged. Finally, it renames the designated area as the Flatside-Bethune Wilderness.
